name: aws-dashboard-monorepo
description: AWS Dashboard for EKS cluster management

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.electron:build: npm run build:frontend && cd electron && npm run build:mac
scripts.setup: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
